home.mission: Intego yacu ni ukuzamura ubumenyi bwa buri mwana.
home.impact: Twageze ku rubyiruko rwinshi mu bihugu bitandukanye.

about.title: Ibyerekeye Twebwe
about.content: Skillseed ni urubuga rugamije guteza imbere ubumenyi binyuze mu ikoranabuhanga.

contact.title: Twandikire
contact.content: Nyamuneka twandikire niba ufite ikibazo cyangwa igitekerezo.
